item.title: How to Set Environment Variables in Linux?
item.description:
Or How to use the export command

Linux shell has become a constant part of every ML Engineer, Data Scientist and Programmerâ€™s life. We need linux to login to servers, write complex scripts, and run various programs. And sometimes we need linux to install certain programs too.
